info.name: MAX-3B
info.description:
API for MAX-3B radio

Contact Support:
 Email: ki6syd@gmail.com

item.name: Send a FT8 free text message

query.description: (Required) 13 character free-text FT8 message to send
Caller's current time [epoch ms]. If provided, radio will update its current time to match timeNow. If not provided, radio will use its best estimate of current time.

Dial frequency for FT8 [Hz]. If nothing provided, radio will decide the best frequency using its own logic. Radio may use standard digital mode frequency in the current current band, a pre-set configured frequency for sending all FT8 messages, etc.
Audio frequency (USB) relative to RF dial frequency [Hz]. Radio will pick an audio frequency if nothing provided. May be randomized, fixed 1500 Hz, configured in settings file, etc.

Audio frequency (USB) relative to RF dial frequency [Hz]. Radio will pick an audio frequency if nothing provided. May be randomized, fixed 1500 Hz, configured in settings file, etc.

response.name: Unable to accept message into queue

item.name: Stop sending any FT8 messages and clear FT8 messages from queue

query.description: Keyer speed while sending CW message [wpm]
Dial frequency for sending [Hz]. If nothing provided, radio will decide the best frequency using its own logic. Radio may use the existing dial frequency, beacon frequency, etc.

item.name: Stop sending any CW messages and clear CW messages from queue
Length of the radio's queue of digital messages

response.name: Number of total messages in radio's queue of digital modes messages

item.name: Stop sending any queued messages, and delete all messages.
DO NOT USE. For testing only. Sends SOTAmat spot as soon as message is received.
Gets the radio's current audio volume

item.name: Gets the radio's current sidetone level offset
Set the radio's sidetone level OFFSET, relative to audio level

item.name: Gets the radio's measured input voltage

response.name: Current temperature. Radio implementation decides which temperature to report, if multiple available.

item.name: Gets the radio's receive or transmit status
Gets the githash of the current firmware
Gets the IP and/or MAC address of the radio
Gets the API versions supported by the radio. Note, there is no base URL for this action

response.name: Current debug variable. Radio may respond with any relevant value.
